/* IDR_INTERVAL  : Default profile is BaseProfile. Test will set B frame 0 and
                   input value will be numer of P frame.
 * LTR_MARK      : Make sure LTRCount is set while creating encoder.
 * LTR_USE       : Make sure LTRCount and LTR_MARK is set.
 */

Bitrate       : 6000000
Framerate     : 0
Request_IDR   : 1
IDR_INTERVAL  : 0
LTR_MARK      : 0
LTR_USE       : 0
